By the way, no truth in a new contract being discussed either.

Ajax have announced the signing of Lisandro Martinez from Argentine club Defensa y Justicia.

The 21-year-old central defender, who can also play at left-back, signed a four-year contract with an option to extend for a fifth season after completing a medical on Monday.

He played a key role for Defensa in 2018 as they finished second in the Primera Division, four points behind Racing, and earned his Argentina debut in March when he featured against Venezuela.
